mapper.select: /* StoreChgCostPriceMapper.getProdPriceInfo */ SELECT thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD , thp.PROD_CD , thp.PROD_NM , NVL(thpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS SALE_UPRC -- 본사 판매가 , NVL(thp.COST_UPRC, 0) AS COST_UPRC -- 본사 원가 FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 thpsp WHERE thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thp.PROD_CD = #{prodCd} AND thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsp.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')

/* StoreChgCostPriceMapper.getIostockProdPriceInfo */ SELECT thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD , thp.PROD_CD , thp.PROD_NM , NVL(thpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS SALE_UPRC -- 본사 판매가 , NVL(tshsm.AVG_COST_UPRC, 0) AS COST_UPRC -- 본사 수불 원가 FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 thpsp , TB_ST_HQ_STOCK_MONTHLY tshsm WHERE thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thp.PROD_CD = #{prodCd} AND thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsp.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND tshsm.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tshsm.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND tshsm.IOSTOCK_YM = #{iostockYm} AND tshsm.STORAGE_CD = #{storageCd}

/* StoreChgCostPriceMapper.getByStoreStoreCostPriceList */
SELECT tmp.PROD_CD , tmp.PROD_NM , NVL(thpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS HQ_SALE_UPRC , NVL(tmpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS STORE_SALE_UPRC , NVL(thp.COST_UPRC, 0) AS HQ_COST_UPRC -- 본사원가 , NVL(tmp.COST_UPRC, 0) AS STORE_COST_UPRC -- 매장원가 , NVL(tmp.COST_UPRC, 0) AS COST_UPRC , tmp.PRC_CTRL_FG
FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 thpsp --view , TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 tmpsp --view WHERE 1=1 AND tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} -- 판매상품 여부 AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tms.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpsp.STORE_CD (+)= tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpsp.PROD_CD (+)= tmp.PROD_CD AND tmpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thp.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsp.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{prodHqBrandCd} -- 선택한 상품브랜드가 있을 때
-- 선택한 상품브랜드가 없을 때('전체' 일때), 사용자 관리브랜드에 속한 정보만 조회 AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) ORDER BY tmp.PROD_CD

/* StoreChgCostPriceMapper.getByStoreStoreIostockCostPriceList */
SELECT tmp.PROD_CD , tmp.PROD_NM , NVL(thpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS HQ_SALE_UPRC , NVL(tmpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS STORE_SALE_UPRC , NVL(tshsm.AVG_COST_UPRC, 0) AS HQ_COST_UPRC , NVL(tsssm.AVG_COST_UPRC, 0) AS STORE_COST_UPRC , NVL(tsssm.AVG_COST_UPRC, 0) AS COST_UPRC , tmp.PRC_CTRL_FG
FROM TB_ST_STORE_STOCK_MONTHLY tsssm , TB_ST_HQ_STOCK_MONTHLY tshsm , TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 thpsp --view , TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 tmpsp --view WHERE 1=1 AND tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} -- 판매상품 여부 AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tms.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpsp.STORE_CD (+)= tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpsp.PROD_CD (+)= tmp.PROD_CD AND tmpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thp.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsp.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND tsssm.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tsssm.IOSTOCK_YM = #{iostockYm} AND tsssm.STORAGE_CD = #{storageCd} AND tsssm.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND tshsm.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tshsm.IOSTOCK_YM (+)= tsssm.IOSTOCK_YM AND tshsm.STORAGE_CD (+)= tsssm.STORAGE_CD AND tshsm.PROD_CD (+)= tsssm.PROD_CD
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{prodHqBrandCd} -- 선택한 상품브랜드가 있을 때
-- 선택한 상품브랜드가 없을 때('전체' 일때), 사용자 관리브랜드에 속한 정보만 조회 AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) ORDER BY tmp.PROD_CD

/* StoreChgCostPriceMapper.getByStoreStoreCostPriceExcelList */ SELECT tmp.PROD_CD , tmp.PROD_NM , NVL(thpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS HQ_SALE_UPRC , NVL(tmpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS STORE_SALE_UPRC , NVL(thp.COST_UPRC, 0) AS HQ_COST_UPRC -- 본사원가 , NVL(tmp.COST_UPRC, 0) AS STORE_COST_UPRC -- 매장원가 , NVL(tmp.COST_UPRC, 0) AS COST_UPRC , tmp.PRC_CTRL_FG FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 thpsp --view , TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 tmpsp --view WHERE 1=1 AND tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} -- 판매상품 여부 AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tms.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpsp.STORE_CD (+)= tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpsp.PROD_CD (+)= tmp.PROD_CD AND tmpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thp.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsp.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd')
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{prodHqBrandCd} -- 선택한 상품브랜드가 있을 때
-- 선택한 상품브랜드가 없을 때('전체' 일때), 사용자 관리브랜드에 속한 정보만 조회 AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) ORDER BY tmp.PROD_CD

/* StoreChgCostPriceMapper.getByStoreStoreIostockCostPriceExcelList */ SELECT tmp.PROD_CD , tmp.PROD_NM , NVL(thpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS HQ_SALE_UPRC , NVL(tmpsp.SALE_UPRC, 0) AS STORE_SALE_UPRC , NVL(tshsm.AVG_COST_UPRC, 0) AS HQ_COST_UPRC , NVL(tsssm.AVG_COST_UPRC, 0) AS STORE_COST_UPRC , NVL(tsssm.AVG_COST_UPRC, 0) AS COST_UPRC , tmp.PRC_CTRL_FG FROM TB_ST_STORE_STOCK_MONTHLY tsssm , TB_ST_HQ_STOCK_MONTHLY tshsm , TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 thpsp --view , TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 tmpsp --view WHERE 1=1 AND tms.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} -- 판매상품 여부 AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tms.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpsp.STORE_CD (+)= tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpsp.PROD_CD (+)= tmp.PROD_CD AND tmpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thp.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsp.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND tsssm.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tsssm.IOSTOCK_YM = #{iostockYm} AND tsssm.STORAGE_CD = #{storageCd} AND tsssm.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND tshsm.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tshsm.IOSTOCK_YM (+)= tsssm.IOSTOCK_YM AND tshsm.STORAGE_CD (+)= tsssm.STORAGE_CD AND tshsm.PROD_CD (+)= tsssm.PROD_CD
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE 1=1 AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} )
AND tmp.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD = #{prodHqBrandCd} -- 선택한 상품브랜드가 있을 때
-- 선택한 상품브랜드가 없을 때('전체' 일때), 사용자 관리브랜드에 속한 정보만 조회 AND tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN
#{item}
AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) ORDER BY tmp.PROD_CD
mapper.insert: /* StoreChgCostPriceMapper.saveCostPriceExcelUploadCheck */ INSERT INTO TB_TMP_EXCEL_COST_PRICE ( SESSION_ID, SEQ, HQ_OFFICE_CD, STORE_CD, PROD_CD, COST_UPRC, RESULT, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{sessionId}, #{seq}, #{hqOfficeCd}, #{storeCd}, #{prodCd}, #{costUprc}, #{result}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select: /* StoreChgCostPriceMapper.getStoreCostPriceExcelUploadCheckList */ SELECT A.RESULT , A.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , A.PROD_CD , tmp.PROD_NM , thpsp.SALE_UPRC AS HQ_SALE_UPRC -- 본사판매가 , tmpsp.SALE_UPRC AS STORE_SALE_UPRC -- 매장판매가 , thp.COST_UPRC AS HQ_COST_UPRC -- 본사원가 , tmp.COST_UPRC AS STORE_COST_UPRC -- 매장원가 , A.COST_UPRC AS COST_UPRC -- 변경원가 , tmp.PRC_CTRL_FG , A.SEQ FROM TB_TMP_EXCEL_COST_PRICE A , TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 thpsp --view , TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 tmpsp --view WHERE 1=1 AND A.SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD (+)= A.STORE_CD AND tmp.PROD_CD (+)= A.PROD_CD AND tmpsp.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpsp.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND tmpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thp.PROD_CD (+)= A.PROD_CD AND thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsp.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') ORDER BY A.SEQ

/* StoreChgCostPriceMapper.getStoreIostockCostPriceExcelUploadCheckList */ SELECT A.RESULT , A.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , A.PROD_CD , tmp.PROD_NM , thpsp.SALE_UPRC AS HQ_SALE_UPRC , tmpsp.SALE_UPRC AS STORE_SALE_UPRC , tshsm.AVG_COST_UPRC AS HQ_COST_UPRC , tsssm.AVG_COST_UPRC AS STORE_COST_UPRC , A.COST_UPRC AS COST_UPRC -- 변경원가 , tmp.PRC_CTRL_FG , A.SEQ FROM TB_TMP_EXCEL_COST_PRICE A , TB_ST_STORE_STOCK_MONTHLY tsssm , TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp , TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 tmpsp --view , TB_ST_HQ_STOCK_MONTHLY tshsm , TB_HQ_PRODUCT thp , TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_V01 thpsp --view WHERE 1=1 AND A.SESSION_ID = #{sessionId} AND A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD AND tmp.STORE_CD (+)= A.STORE_CD AND tmp.PROD_CD (+)= A.PROD_CD AND tmpsp.STORE_CD = tmp.STORE_CD AND tmpsp.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND tmpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thp.PROD_CD (+)= A.PROD_CD AND thpsp.HQ_OFFICE_CD = thp.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsp.PROD_CD = thp.PROD_CD AND thpsp.SALE_DATE = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yyyyMMdd') AND tsssm.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tsssm.IOSTOCK_YM = #{iostockYm} AND tsssm.STORAGE_CD = #{storageCd} AND tsssm.PROD_CD = tmp.PROD_CD AND tshsm.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tshsm.IOSTOCK_YM (+)= tsssm.IOSTOCK_YM AND tshsm.STORAGE_CD (+)= tsssm.STORAGE_CD AND tshsm.PROD_CD (+)= tsssm.PROD_CD AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (thp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) AND ( ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) != 0) AND (tmp.HQ_BRAND_CD IN (SELECT HQ_BRAND_CD FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})) ) OR ( ((SELECT COUNT(HQ_BRAND_CD) FROM TB_WB_USER_BRAND WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}) = 0) AND 1=1 ) ) ORDER BY A.SEQ
